name: youtube-music
title: YouTube Music
description: Control the YouTube Music tab in browser with your keyboard.
author: danieldbird

preferences.name: browser
preferences.title: Browser where YouTube Music opened.
preferences.description: Script will control the YouTube Music tab in this browser.

preferences.name: ff-rew-seconds
preferences.title: Number of seconds to fast forward or rewind.
preferences.description: Number of seconds to fast forward or rewind.

commands.name: play-pause
commands.title: Toggle Play/Pause
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Toggles play or pause of the current track in YouTube Music.

commands.name: previous-track
commands.title: Previous Track
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Skips to the previous track in YouTube Music.

commands.name: next-track
commands.title: Next Track
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Skips to the next track in YouTube Music.

commands.name: like
commands.title: Like
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Adds current track to "Liked" collection in YouTube Music.

commands.name: dislike
commands.title: Dislike
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Removes current track from "Liked" collection in YouTube Music.

commands.name: fast-forward
commands.title: Fast Forward
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Fast forwards the current track in YouTube Music.

commands.name: rewind
commands.title: Rewind
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Rewinds the current track in YouTube Music.

commands.name: next-chapter
commands.title: Next Chapter
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Skips to the next chapter in YouTube Music.

commands.name: previous-chapter
commands.title: Previous Chapter
commands.subtitle: YouTube Music
commands.description: Skips to the previous chapter in YouTube Music.
